message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $14,000. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $12,000 for it.
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is cutting it too close to my bottom line. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I am still unable to meet you at $13,000. My maximum budget remains at $12,000. Thank you for understanding.
